description:
Taichi is in a rough spot in his life. In debt and without any other options, he ended up with a low-paying cleaning job at a resort.

But suddenly, two wand-wielding girls appear before him.

Although he tries his best to avoid getting involved, the two girls drag him into their battle with the forces of evil.

A third girl later appears, tempting him with work that is a bit darker than what he is used to.

Will he be able to resist temptation and defeat the evil that is accumulating in the resort?


OUR CHARACTERS:

Yuki is someone who wholeheartedly believes in her mission as a magical girl. She is energetic and performs her job with passion.

Hikari is kind and more level-headed. Although she enjoys her work as a magical girl, she seems to treat it as she would any other job.

Ayame, although she is a magical girl, she does not draw her power from love. She has a domineering personality and seems to relish teasing Taichi. Do her actions and words really reflect who she truly is? 

* Visual novel with choices
name: Sakura Magical Girls
